name: Survive la France
storyline:
Of course, our society was not perfect.
By the way, you were often upset by the government, or the stupid actions of people.
There was a lot of tension…
Can't remember why.
And then the authorities stopped talking on TV.
And then the TV stopped broadcasting.
The next day, there was no electricity.
Three days later, there was no more water.
You have always been prepared for this worst-case scenario. You barricaded yourself in your home, in your small village and you lived months of solitude, sometimes awakened by the cries of animals… or humans.
And then one evening while turning on your radio with your last batteries, you heard:
“We are the community of the Reunited States. To men and women of good will who want to rebuild society, join the town. We are waiting for you there.”
You made the decision to leave overnight.
summary: A browser text-game in which you travel from city to city and try to manage your food, water and sleep in order to survive until you find a suitable city in France or the USA.
